title: Buying Rp
body: I just bought 10$ worth of rp and it didnt goo through and i bought it again and it went through please riot i would like either a refund or my RP If u check the Logs Grantaaa brought 10$ but the 1st 1 didnt go through so please riot refund or give me my RP thanks

replies.body:
Hi Grantaaa,

Sorry to hear that mate, and we will definitely issue you a refund if that is the case. Can you please submit a player support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Thank you
I gotta say, I miss seeing your avatar. Forums RIP.
